title: The Sound of Summer
detail_text: <:th_ch0209/>........<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0108/>Rina, what have you been staring at?<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0209/>That thing.<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0108/>That? Oh, a wind chime, huh. How nice~<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0209/>Yesterday after the club, Ai-san said, “Ai wants to make the clubroom more summer-like!”.... So she put one on.<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0108/>Wonderful! The majestic sound of wind chimes echoing in the hot summer really does make you feel that this is what Japanese summer is all about, doesn’t it?<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0209/>Yeah.... But the wind hasn’t really blown since she put it on yesterday.... so I haven’t been able to hear it yet. That’s why I thought I’d wait around until I hear it today.<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0108/>Fufu, that’s lovely. Hey, can Mari wait with you, Rina?<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0209/>Of course! I want to hear.... the sound of the wind chimes with you, Mari-san!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0108/>Thank you! Then, let’s talk about stuff while we wait♪<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0000/>Translated by SIFAStheatre and Idol Story<:dt_line_end/>
